question: A friend of yours is thinking of going on camping holiday for the first time this summer. He/she has asked for your advice.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter.-	Explain why you think your friend would enjoy a camping holiday-	Describe some possible disadvantages-	Say whether you would like to go camping with your friend this summer
text: I hope, you are doing well and enjoying your life. In your letter, you asked for my advice and my opinions because I have many years of experience  camping.
I think you will love this opportunity because I know you used to go on camping vacations. As you tried before, there are some options to do such as scouting and walking in nature.

However, although there are lots of advantages, keep in mind that it has some downsides including cold weather, insects and cleaning problems. When you fall asleep, a disgusting insect can bite you so you wake up suddenly. you should take a spare blanket because it is cold in the evening.

I love to accompany you but I have to go to another program for my business. My manager assigned me a new hard task so I should travel to Australia and inspect my teams on the side.  if you have any questions, you know you can ask me without hesitation.
I look forward to hearing  from you soon.
